song.title: To Reach Quest's End
song.info:
Original Song Info (sans contact info):
To Reach Quests' End for MODs Anthology CD
Sample Credits:
Purple Motion Skaven Necros Krystall Markell Moss Others (Tambourine and Snare) Gravis UltraSound
This song was originally an S3M written for a diskmag that was finally released about 6 months after it's original deadline! (That wasn't my fault :) ) It was also part of Epinicion's BLT musicdisk (still in S3M format) - I converted it to .IT for this CD, modifying very little (just to take a little advantage of the instrument options) and I shoved in a 16-bit version of the strings. It's almost identical to the original file (ie. it doesn't *really* use volume envelopes or NNAs, which could have made this so much easier (quicker) to write).
The time changes in this piece may make the rhythm *SEEM* stuffed when you watch the pattern data...
Make sure you listen to at least order 10! That's when the real music starts.
Hope you like this!
